en.title: FE Donates RM 22,809 to Marcus Ho Appeal.
en.content:
FE continues to support the less fortunate.

At FE's Event on 02nd August 2008, FE organized a charity drive together with Multicultural Ladies Association (MLA) to help raise funds to help Marcus Ho whose plight was featured in the Star Newspaper. During the event FE members donated generously and collected a total of RM 22,809.00 (including RM 10,000.00 from FE HQ). The donation was presented to Patricia Lum, President of MLA by Paul Ting.
